internet_in_japan.title: Early Internet Adoption
internet_in_japan.description: Japan begins adopting the internet with academic and research networks.

internet_in_japan.title: Rise of Commercial Internet
internet_in_japan.description: The first major ISPs (Internet Service Providers) emerge, and personal internet access starts becoming available to the public.

internet_in_japan.title: Broadband Expansion
internet_in_japan.description: Japan introduces high-speed broadband connections, including ADSL and fiber-optic internet, leading to widespread adoption.

internet_in_japan.title: Mobile Internet Boom
internet_in_japan.description: With the rise of smartphones, Japan experiences a surge in mobile internet usage, driven by 3G and later 4G LTE networks.

internet_in_japan.title: Fiber-Optic Dominance
internet_in_japan.description: Fiber-optic internet becomes the standard in Japan, with some of the fastest internet speeds available globally.

internet_in_japan.title: 5G Network Introduction
internet_in_japan.description: Japan rolls out 5G networks, enhancing mobile connectivity, streaming, and IoT applications.

internet_in_japan.title: AI and Internet Evolution
internet_in_japan.description: Japan integrates AI-driven technologies with the internet, expanding applications in automation, smart cities, and digital security.
